title: Tom Brady, Redskins, Harden-Antetokounmpo, and drafting
itunes:title: Tom Brady, Redskins, Harden-Antetokounmpo, and drafting
description:
Colin gives his reason why he doesn't believe Tom Brady will leave the Patriots, why the Redskins should draft Tua Tagovailoa, his thoughts on the feud between James Harden and Giannis Antetokounmpo, and why it's important who drafts you. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Tom Penn, Bob Stoops, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
